title.narrative: Improve the European COMISSIONS Understanding of and Approach to SUPPPORTING Civil Society in Western Balkans and Moldova to Improve Voice and Accountability in Line With European UNION Accession Perspectives

description.narrative: This activity (Improve the European COMISSIONS Understanding of and Approach to SUPPPORTING Civil Society in Western Balkans and Moldova to Improve Voice and Accountability in Line With European UNION Accession Perspectives) is a component of Improve the European Commissions Understanding of and Approach to Supporting Civil Society in the Western Balkans and Moldova reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £18,943. This component benefits Europe, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society. The start date is 23-07-2009 and the end date is 30-01-2010.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
